criteria: Explanation of the Transformation into the Final Solution
Knowledge of the Holocaust and its Consequences
descriptions: Demonstrates no understanding of Nazi racial policies or their goals.
Shows minimal understanding of Nazi racial policy, with significant inaccuracies.
